name: Disc League
description: Fast PvP disc combat with dedicated servers and stunning visuals. Master the spinning, curving and bouncing of your disc through multiple arenas online with other intelligent beings (be they human or otherwise).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i3 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2475 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i3 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2475 MB available space
